home.title: Sand Tetris
home.subtitle: How to Play Sand Tetris
home.introduction: Sand Tetris combines classic Tetris gameplay with realistic sand physics, creating a unique puzzle experience. Watch as blocks transform into flowing sand particles, adding a new layer of strategy to the beloved game.

step_1.text: Click "Play Now" and watch a brief 5-second advertisement

step_2.text: Look for the flashing "Press Enter" prompt and click it

step_3.text: Click "Start" to begin your Sand Tetris adventure

gameRules.title: Game Rules
gameRules.intro: The key to success in Sand Tetris is strategic color placement:
rules: Keep green sand on the left side and right side
When matching colors connect, they'll disappear and add to your score
Continue this process to achieve higher scores
Your scores are automatically saved to our server after each game

classic.description: Play until the sand fills the screen, with increasing speed as you progress.

timeChallenge.title: 3-Minute Challenge
timeChallenge.description: Race against time to achieve the highest possible score.

clear40.title: Clear 40
clear40.description: Clear exactly 40 rows at your own pace - perfect for mastering the mechanics.

proTips.title: Pro Tips
tips: Clear multiple rows quickly to build combos up to 10x multiplier
Each sand particle cleared adds to your score
Start with Easy mode to learn sand physics behavior
Plan your moves carefully - sand flows differently than solid blocks
